name: Easter Egg - Snow on Mt. Silver
name_original: Easter Egg - Snow on Mt. Silver
description:
Pokemon Silver Easter Egg - Snow on Mt. Silver is a Fangame of Pokemon Silver of GameBoy Color based on the Creepypasta of the same name. Fangame originally created in 2015 by ProfessorCreepyPasta, Mibevan, DarksoulzFZ and recently remade and programmed in 2020 by Annie-Mienai in RPG Maker VX Ace.

Available languages: Spanish and English (based on ROMs).

To understand the game, you must read the creepypasta.
Read Creepypasta: (Eng) / (Esp)

The credits of the sprites, scripts, and game instructions are in the "Readme.txt" that comes with the game.

Remember to comment and support the game on the original post.

Thank you for downloading and supporting the Game! Website design inspired by Tohjo Falls (Lost Silver Creator)
